──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── #> ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ readr 2.1.4 #> ✔ ggplot2 3.4.2 ✔ stringr 1.5.0 #> ✔ lubridate 1.9.2 ✔ tibble 3.2.1 #> ✔ purrr 1.0.1 ✔ tidyr 1.3.0 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── #> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() #> ✖ stringr::fixed() masks recipes::fixed() #> ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() #> ℹ Use the conflicted package () to force all conflicts to become errors ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) library(stringr) library(rsample) library(workflows) library(parsnip) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='supervised_ml_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_12d7204f3d3ca93272ea78bc75d6c395'} ```{.r .cell-code} bike_features_tbl <- readRDS("C:/Users/rampr/OneDrive/Documents/GitHub/ss23-bdml-muhundhan-ramprasath/bike_features_tbl.rds") %>% select(model, price, frame_material, weight) ``` ::: #creating recipe ::: {.cell hash='supervised_ml_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_bd9c15d4fcace01f12a3c7e106b67f56'} ```{.r .cell-code} bike_recipe <- recipe(price ~ weight, data = bike_features_tbl) %>% step_dummy(all_nominal(), -all_outcomes(), one_hot = TRUE) bike_baked <- prep(bike_recipe) %>% bake(new_data = bike_features_tbl) %>% mutate(model = bike_features_tbl$model) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='supervised_ml_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_fbfa29ae814018868cc6b8d23954022f'} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(bike_baked, aes(x = price, y = weight)) + geom_point() + labs(title = "Scatter Plot", x = "Price", y = "Weight") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](supervised_ml_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='supervised_ml_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_552b0f316aed899edd47636de43055f3'} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(1113) split_obj <- initial_split(bike_baked, prop = 0.80) train_tbl <- training(split_obj) test_tbl <- testing(split_obj) ``` ::: #linear model ::: {.cell hash='supervised_ml_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_2d36ce8b477f63374b06f0353fcd8a78'} ```{.r .cell-code} linear_model <- linear_reg(mode = "regression") workflow_obj <- workflow(bike_recipe, linear_model) %>% fit(data = train_tbl) linear_prediction <- predict(workflow_obj, new_data = test_tbl) linear_comparison <- linear_prediction %>% mutate(weight = test_tbl$weight) %>% mutate(correct_price = test_tbl$price) ``` ::: # decision tree model ::: {.cell hash='supervised_ml_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_d8e4a5d6b310021275fd3e66d2712066'} ```{.r .cell-code} decision_tree_model <- decision_tree(mode = "regression", tree_depth = 5, cost_complexity = 0.001, min_n = 7) dt_workflow_obj <- workflow(bike_recipe, decision_tree_model) %>% fit(data = train_tbl) dt_prediction <- predict(dt_workflow_obj, new_data = test_tbl) dt_comparison <- dt_prediction %>% mutate(weight = test_tbl$weight) %>% mutate(correct_price = test_tbl$price) ``` ::: #Random forest ::: {.cell hash='supervised_ml_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_3fd45ed004464673b1158f1a58e38f6d'} ```{.r .cell-code} rf_model <- rand_forest(mode = "regression", mtry = 8, trees = 5000, min_n = 10) rf_workflow_obj <- workflow(bike_recipe, rf_model) %>% fit(data = train_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: 8 columns were requested but there were 1 predictors in the data. 1 #> will be used. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} rf_prediction <- predict(rf_workflow_obj, new_data = test_tbl) rf_comparison <- rf_prediction %>% mutate(weight = test_tbl$weight) %>% mutate(correct_price = test_tbl$price) ``` ::: #comparison ::: {.cell hash='supervised_ml_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_628d4cec3996c791dc34a7031bf02de4'} ```{.r .cell-code} linear_comparison %>% yardstick::metrics(truth = correct_price, estimate = .pred) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} dt_comparison %>% yardstick::metrics(truth = correct_price, estimate = .pred) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} rf_comparison %>% yardstick::metrics(truth = correct_price, estimate = .pred) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
